{"games":[{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":5126150,"totalDownVotes":991525,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":356927,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"❄️ Winter Holiday! ❄️
🗓️ Advent Calendar is back! Log in for prizes every day! 
🐧 8 NEW festive pets, including the Walrus box!
⛸️ New minigames - get your skates on!
🎁 New toys and cozy pet wear! 

Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

🐾 New updates coming soon!
🐦 Check our Twitter for news and competitions!
🤩 New chances to win pets every week!

🐦 Follow @PlayAdoptMe on Twitter for updates: https://twitter.com/PlayAdoptMe
🎥 Subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/PlayAdoptMe

Meet the founders!
NewFissy - Tech Director (https://twitter.com/newfissy)
Bethink - Creative Director (https://twitter.com/Bethink_RBX)

Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.

Thanks for playing!

Private Server Controls: To open private server controls you must be owner of a server and click the grey button on top left of screen.

","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2434595,"totalDownVotes":319099,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Day🎁4! Royale🏰High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":119477,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"❄️11:18: Pre-Winter Update out now in new servers! Read the update log for more info♡

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":4691281,"totalDownVotes":397437,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":80087,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!","genre":""},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3744873,"totalDownVotes":374875,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":65390,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. The possibilities are endless!

Version: 0.10.1
Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910","genre":""},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1395196,"totalDownVotes":78549,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":36190,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592","genre":""},{"creatorId":123247,"creatorName":"alexnewtron","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2493923,"totalDownVotes":349280,"universeId":140239261,"name":"❄️ MeepCity ❄️","placeId":370731277,"playerCount":74260,"imageToken":"T_370731277_ebb7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💙💙 The game that is Powering Imagination! And join our Roblox group/community!","genre":""},{"creatorId":1730435200,"creatorName":"SnowdustDev","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":262759,"totalDownVotes":102999,"universeId":1852226622,"name":"Gacha Online ✨","placeId":5289509545,"playerCount":49995,"imageToken":"T_5289509545_1eec","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"➡️ Gacha Online's content is 100% free for everyone to enjoy 🌟 ⬅️

[ Game Version 1.57 - Poses Update! ]
🔊 Subscribe to see UPDATE SNEAK PEEKS and livestreams!!
♦️ https://www.youtube.com/Snowdust?sub_confirmation=1

~~~~~~~ Welcome to Gacha Online BETA! ~~~~~~~ (*・ω・)ﾉ
Make your Gacha OCs in Roblox ⭐WITH MULTIPLAYER!⭐

Have fun Roleplaying, Exploring, and meeting new friends!
-- Design your own character using BILLIONS of outfits!
-- Make Gacha Mini Movies!
-- COMPLETELY FREE CUSTOMIZATION! :D

-- Made with ❤️ by Team Snowdust! --

Remember to like 👍 the game, and tell your friends!

This is an official fangame of the Gacha Club and Gacha Life series made by Lunime.
You can find them on the app store!

Credits:
Some maps from Maddoktor2
Boatbomber's windshake

This experience may include paid advertisements that are labeled as "Paid Ads" and use assets from @AdvertUploader.
Thanks everyone for all the support! Exciting things to come :)","genre":""},{"creatorId":4172489,"creatorName":"Scrumptious Studio","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":24997,"totalDownVotes":1806,"universeId":2270890905,"name":"Legends Re:Written","placeId":6198225400,"playerCount":11821,"imageToken":"T_6198225400_da3a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Shutdowns = Updates/Game patches
-ALPHA V0.15-
*This game is intended to be played on PC but is accessible to mobile players, the mobile codes are slightly behind so not all game features are available. An Xbox port will also come eventually*

⚔️ Fight enemies and bosses to get drops and level up your skills! 
⛏️ Mine ores and craft them into armor and weapons in the blacksmith!
🎊 Roll for a Blessing Magic!
✨ Explore the map and find artifacts to learn magic! Artifacts will spawn depending on the season!
🎉 Max your skills and unlock level 100 skill capes!
🌎 Raids coming soon!

🎮CONTROLS🎮
M: Menu
F: Block
R: Free Fall
Left CTRL: Run
Q: Roll
Jump + Q: Dash
Equip Weapon(4) + E: Counter
Double Jump: "Space + Space"
Wall Jump: Double Jump into wall
H: Spawn Mount

Codes can be found on my YT channel! @BeasTakip","genre":""},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2678813,"totalDownVotes":286062,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] WINTER HOLIDAY!","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":50311,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

Controls:
Pick up items / Use items - Click (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or Right Trigger (Controller)
Crouch / Place trap - CTRL (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or B (Controller)

Credits:
IK3As - Building
Optikk - Build Mode
TenuousFlea - 'Billy' Model, 'Kraxicorde' Model
For You to Stay © 2019 Mira K.","genre":""},{"creatorId":82471,"creatorName":"Dued1","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2321837,"totalDownVotes":171968,"universeId":47545,"name":"🍕Work at a Pizza Place","placeId":192800,"playerCount":41142,"imageToken":"T_192800_100f","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":" 🔊21 player voice chat servers are now here!

------------------------------

*Activate Gamepass Modes in the Robux GUI, click the one you own
------------------------------
Join the discoard to read the update log.
------------------------------
Be aware that this game doesn't save tycoons and weapons. It was not designed to be that way.
------------------------------
